original_text: You Israelites have caused this to happen. The Lord your God was leading you on the right way. But you decided not to follow him any longer. You Israelites have caused this to happen. The Lord your God was leading you on the right way. But you decided not to follow him any longer. You Israelites have caused this to happen. The Lord your God was leading you on the right way. But you decided not to follow him any longer. You Israelites have caused this to happen.
korean_text: 네 하나님 여호와가 너를 길로 인도할 때에 네가 그를 떠남으로 이를 자취함이 아니냐

sentences.original_text: You Israelites have caused this to happen.
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘 사람들아, 너희가 이 일을 일으켰다.

sentences.original_text: The Lord your God was leading you
sentences.korean_translation: 주 너의 하나님께서 너를 인도하고 계셨다.

sentences.original_text: But you decided not to follow him
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 너는 그를 따르지 않기로 결정했다.

sentences.original_text: You Israelites have caused this to happen.
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘 사람들아, 너희가 이 일을 일으켰다.
